name: GM TOP 206-60
description: The GM TOP 206-60 is a coaxial 2.5-way passive top unit featuring a closed cabinet design. It is equipped with a 6.5" neodymium low-mid driver, a 6.5" neodymium mid-range driver, and a 1" neodymium high-frequency driver, offering precise sound reproduction across a wide frequency range. With a compact form factor and high efficiency, it is ideal for various sound reinforcement applications. The cabinet is constructed from 12mm birch plywood and includes feet, a handle, and M10 rigging points for versatile mounting options.
